functions.name: setup_docs
functions.docstring: Setup documentation

functions.name: collect_project_data
functions.docstring: Collect project data from user input.

functions.name: generate_docs
functions.docstring: Generate documentation

functions.name: add_header
functions.docstring: Add or remove license headers. Usage: inv license.add-header --action=remove

modules.docstring: Task management module for handling task operations.

classes.name: TaskManager
classes.docstring: Manages task operations including creation, retrieval, and updates.

methods.name: __init__
methods.docstring:
Initialize TaskManager with specified tasks file.

Args:
    tasks_file: Path to tasks JSON file. Defaults to Config.TASKS_FILE.

methods.name: add_task
methods.docstring:
Add a new task.

Args:
    title: Task title (required)
    description: Task description
    tags: List of task tags
    status: Task status (default: 'todo')
    
Returns:
    The newly created task dictionary

methods.name: list_tasks
methods.docstring:
List all tasks, optionally filtered by status.

Args:
    status_filter: Optional status to filter tasks by
    
Returns:
    List of task dictionaries

methods.name: get_task
methods.docstring:
Get a specific task by ID.

Args:
    task_id: The task ID to retrieve
    
Returns:
    Task dictionary or None if not found

methods.name: update_task
methods.docstring:
Update task fields.

Args:
    task_id: The task ID to update
    **updates: Field names and values to update
    
Returns:
    True if task was updated, False if not found

methods.name: delete_task
methods.docstring:
Delete a task by ID.

Args:
    task_id: The task ID to delete
    
Returns:
    True if task was deleted, False if not found

functions.name: add_task
functions.docstring: Add a new task (legacy interactive function).

functions.name: list_tasks
functions.docstring: List all tasks (legacy print function).

functions.name: init_project
functions.docstring: Initialize the project: create dirs, files, download community files, and init uv env.

functions.name: ai_doc_gen
functions.docstring: Invoke Task to Generate Documentation

functions.name: clone_github_repos
functions.docstring:
Clone all repositories from a specified GitHub user.

Args:
    source_user (str): The GitHub username to clone repositories from.

functions.name: run_command_safe
functions.docstring:
Safely run a command with error handling and logging

Args:
    ctx: Invoke context
    command (str): Command to run
    output_file (str): Optional output file for command result
    description (str): Description for logging

Returns:
    tuple: (success: bool, result: str)

functions.name: check_tool_availability
functions.docstring: Check if a tool is available in the system PATH

functions.name: copy_file_safe
functions.docstring: Safely copy a file with error handling

functions.name: generate_system_reports
functions.docstring:
Generate comprehensive system reports and copy configuration files.

Args:
    destination_folder (str): Destination folder for reports (default: Config.BACKUP_DIR)
    include_optional (bool): Include optional/experimental package managers

functions.name: list_system_tools
functions.docstring: List available system package managers and tools.

functions.name: quick_backup
functions.docstring:
Quick backup of essential system configurations.
Only backs up core package managers and essential config files.

functions.name: get_unique_filename
functions.docstring:
Generate a unique filename by appending version numbers if duplicates exist.

Args:
    destination_path (Path): The destination directory
    filename (str): The original filename
    
Returns:
    str: A unique filename

functions.name: move_files_to_directory
functions.docstring: Move files with duplicate handling and logging

functions.name: ensure_directories_exist
functions.docstring: Create directories if they don't exist

functions.name: validate_paths
functions.docstring: Validate that all required paths exist and are accessible

functions.name: organize_files
functions.docstring:
Organize files from a source directory to categorized directories based on file patterns.
Handles duplicates by renaming with version numbers and logs all operations.

Args:
    source_directory (str): The directory to scan and clean files from.
    destination_directory (str): The root directory where categorized folders will be created.
    patterns_file (str): Path to the JSON file containing file patterns.
    log_directory (str, optional): Directory to store log files. If None, uses destination_directory/logs.

functions.name: create_patterns_sample
functions.docstring:
Create a sample patterns JSON file.

Args:
    output_file (str): Path where to create the sample file

functions.name: clean_folder
functions.docstring:
Clean a folder by organizing files into categories.
Simplified interface for common use case.

Args:
    folder (str): Folder to clean (default: current directory)
    patterns (str): Patterns file (default: file_patterns.json)
    destination (str): Where to create organized folders (default: same as folder)
